entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates code that doesn't compile when using StringValues #94547
  • [API Proposal]: Expose the remaining const values in TimeSpan #94545
  • ConfigurationBinder emits AOT warnings even when using Source Generator when passing result into a method #94544
  • Reflection fails when working with struct implementing interface that implements inherited static abstract members #94543
  • Failures building from v6.0.x tags #94541
  • [8.0] Failure in Wasi.Build.Tests.WasiTemplateTests.ConsoleBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #94537
    8.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Add `BindingFlags.PublicOrNonPublic` #94536
    9.0.0
  • UInt64.CreateSaturating<Int128> truncates instead of saturates #94523
    9.0.0
  • List of Redundant conditional #94522
  • Properly test the domain of values in `VARIANT` scenarios #94521
    9.0.0
  • Is there a way to modify the file properties of the exe generated after .NET compilation? #94519
  • APIs that return tokens should be marked RequiresUnreferencedCode #94514
  • Can't import Component Model functions in WASI apps #94513
  • System.Version constructor throws exception with confusing message #94511
  • [HTTP/3] SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3.LargeSingleHeader_ThrowsException QUIC connection timeout #94507
  • RS sync notification flare arm64 #94502
    Future
  • Docs and XML comments for Min/MaxMagnitude are incorrect #94500
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_Create_Invalid #94498

Closed

  • NET 6.0 - mutual TLS with private key stored in TPM2 #94493
  • options.GetConverter used inside other JsonConverter causes "Deserialization of types without[...]" error #94538
  • [8.0] System.Net.Quic.QuicException : The connection timed out from inactivity. #94539
    8.0.x
  • [NativeAOT] Consider moving `Monitor.DebugBlockingScope` to be under `Lock` #94242
    9.0.0
  • CultureInfo.Parent under LC_ALL=C does not refer to itself #94505
    Future
  • Mistake in isProxyAuth condition in the InnerSendAsync #94504
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Timer` timeout #91545
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskOptionsTestAsync` fails #91549
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskContinueWhenAllTests` fails #91548
    9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] `Http.Tests` fails with `Operation is not supported on this platform` #91673
    9.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] The System.Threading.Tasks.Dataflow.Tests TransformManyBlockTests.TestProducerConsumerAsyncEnumerable fails on Browser when multi-threading is enabled #75389
    9.0.0
  • Will #88851 be backported to .NET Core 6 or 7? #92239
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Ensure that a native code version only ever gets one entry point that doesn't change #94542
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94540
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: Print finally clone stats with JitTimeLogCsv #94533
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove `BBF_DONT_REMOVE` from some blocks that can be removed #94532
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix test returning 100 unconditionally #94531
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • improve debuging HTTP/2 tests #94530
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Arm64/SVE: Add Uzp1 #94529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Combine rootDir with relative file names #94528
    NO-MERGE, breaking-change, area-Extensions-FileSystem, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that `JsonSerializerOptions.CacheContext` is a singleton. #94527
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] mono only on deputy testing #94525
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [MT][browser] Enable `TestCancelAsync` #94517
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Implement frozen object heap #94515
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add branch label offset to disasm #94512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Merge ServicePoint assembly into Requests #94510
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94506
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Add "no R2R" runs. #94509
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Update to servicing branding #94526
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix conditions in targetingpacks.targets #94524
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #94484
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add `-repeatCount` in superpmi.exe to repeat method compilation #94503
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94469
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.2
  • [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94437
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [browser][mt] Enable `TestProducerConsumerAsyncEnumerable` #94508
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Fix typos in XML comments on XxHash128 #94495
    area-System.IO
  • Fixed interpreter for x64 #94501
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #94408
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android

Updated

  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Comvariant Failure on s390x #94453
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect case sensitivity in FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet for some cases #93986
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 8.0.1
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #94193
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [RISC-V] Implement SOS related Debugger API code. #94454
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][MT] more testing and cleanup #94466
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94438
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add printing full type name of nested types for ilverify output #94441
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • LSRA: PreferCalleeSave for non-localVar intervals #92744
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • ElapsedEventArgs: public constructor + sealed #94489
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • HashSet.UnionWith preformance improvement #92300
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Complex Rune enumeration over spans of UTF-16 and UTF-8 text #87927
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • update Alpine test images #94487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.NET.Sdk imports CustomBeforeDirectoryBuildProps after DirectoryBuildPropsPath #36749
  • Runtime identifier not validated by dotnet build if --no-self-contained is passed #36746
  • Multi-arch/framework in restore/build/publish commands #36727

Closed

  • # I have a fix ! #36286
  • Add flag to stop using the workload set version and just use the installed manifests #34562
  • Support for workload set versions - authoring workload set assets and packages #34282
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64][Unstable][Regression]"Unable to read data from the transport connection: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host..." error happens during publish project in CLI. #36643

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36748
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Freeze Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildSdkResolver assembly version #36733
    untriaged

Merged

  • Allow trailing commas in launch settings JSON for dotnet watch #36744
    untriaged, Area-Watch
  • Change the format of tool exceptions and NuGet API exceptions to be graceful #36641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36754
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Add option to ignore baseline TFMs #36669
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2311021 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36676
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.2
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #35088
    Area-Tools, 8.0.2xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Accessing InlineArrays nullable fields with ?? operator exited with code -2146232797 #70738
    17.9
  • Fix All for Suppress Message does not filter to a specific diagnostic ID #70737
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.8.0 Preview 2.0: Lengthy string variable makes VS very slow #70736
    Backlog
  • System.BadImageFormatException: Could not load file or assemby 'csc.exe' or one of its dependencies. #70735
  • IntelliSense stopped working after upgrade #70734
    Backlog
  • Format document randomly stops respecting .editorconfig #70733
  • C# editor auto complete fails, if followed by an operator #70732
    Backlog
  • ??= operator generates IDE0052 notice #70728

Closed

  • Collection expressions: additional implicit conversions from builder return value are not included in semantic model #69938
    17.9
  • Collection expressions: implement IOperation #68826
    17.9
  • dotnet watch is not picking up changes on .cshtml files using Razor Pages #67243
    17.9
  • Cannot spread dynamically typed value #70731
  • ISymbol.ToDisplayString throws NullReferenceException in SymbolDisplayVisitor #53943
    17.9
  • Primary constructor variable null in debugger #70730
  • Implicit Conversion to FormattableString Fails with Ternary Operator #70689
  • Collection expressions: CS0121 ambiguous call between `string` and `char[]` #70701

PullRequests

Created

  • Null annotate ArgumentNames. #70739
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow analyzer exceptions to fall through if desired #70729
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [POC - Do not merge] Add target for handling a new MSBuild property 'EnforceCodeStyleSeverityInBuild' #70727
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2310389 #70726
  • Implement textDocument/prepareRename for better rename experience #70724
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Report all errors and rude edits to the log #70503
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Fix emit for anonymous indexed delegates #70501
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, untriaged, 17.9
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #70725
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Only change documents in solution #70669
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Sentence correction #70692
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Indicate when syntax errors are first calculated. #70688
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable spell checker for integration tests #66000
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Switch to Xxhash128 from sha256 #70723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch MSBuildWorkspace to running builds out of proc #70469
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid some first-chance exceptions by returning instead #70695
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the old integration test projects #70716
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Properly parse members in type declarations missing an identifier #69798
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Delay slicing in list pattern until all other element patterns are matched #70615
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: report specific error for spread with no GetEnumerator() method #70717
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revise compound assignment for nullable #70687
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Defer lambda rude edit reporting to runtime #70418
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP #70714
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Change checksums into structs #70245
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Prototype] Show project-wide first party 'Code analysis suggestions' in lightbulb menu #70621
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Unnecessary directives #70251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Method group natural type: only use methods that can be fully substituted and pass constraint checks #69226
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Include syntax error in Hot Reload diagnostics reported to dotnet watch #70540
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Wait for compilation to be available during test setup #70722
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle ref returning receivers in dynamic calls #70676
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Compiler support for respecting custom configured analyzer severity settings #69843
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix for source generator diagnostics not showing up as part of live analysis when generators run in OOP #70715
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #51946
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, single_query #51945
  • Add an easy-to-find doc with a dependency flow graph #51944
  • Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button `formmethod` attribute #51940
    Planning: WebUI
  • CreateInboundActivityHandler override in .net 8 RC2 not being called #51934
  • Perf regression: endpoint, json #51931
  • Blazor webassembly subpath doesn't work #51929
  • System.Net.Internals.SocketExceptionFactory.ExtendedSocketException #51927
  • ASP0000 warning when using `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web` Sdk in project file #51926

Closed

  • Dotnet watch run broken with arguments #51921
  • Perf improvement: json #51930
  • [Blazor] Clarify the statement: Using an event callback parameter with @bind:after isn't supported. #51932
  • Imports in templates should be `global::` prefixed #51928
  • Can't start debugging with MS Edge #51822
  • Improvements to auth and identity in ASP.NET Core 8 #51906
    Discussions
  • NavigationManager.NavigateTo("urlInOtherDomain") causes Uncaught (in promise) WebSocket is not in the OPEN state in Firefox #51936
  • BlazorEnableCompression flag is ignored when publishing Blazor WASM projects #50451
    .NET 8: Documentation
  • Error using RenderModeInteractiveWebAssembly attribute in .NET Core 8 Blazor template project Webassembly #51937
  • Perf regression: plaintext, plaintext #51919
  • Replace outdated dependencies in Blazor Server project template #44606
    Planning: WebUI
  • StaticWebAssetBasePath not taken into account with JavaScript module initalizer #38690
    Planning: WebUI
  • InputSelect bug #33799
    Planning: WebUI
  • JSON/Blazor regression on deserializing IJSInProcessObjectReference with a constructor #37149
    Planning: WebUI

PullRequests

Created

  • Mark API from 8 as shipped #51948
    area-infrastructure
  • Mark API from 8.0 as shipped #51947
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Fix "Blazor enhanced form handling doesn't honor button `formmethod` attribute" #51942
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #51918
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Update SDK to 23556.1 #51907
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51662
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #51663
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-networking, 6.0.24
  • [release/7.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51813
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 7.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Update JS dependencies for `WebAssembly.Authentication` #51817
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, tell-mode, 6.0.24
  • ResourceManagerStringLocalizerTest: support running tests under the invariant culture. #51935
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #51943
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #51917
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.13
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #51916
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.24
  • Use working directory as relative directory for project file resolution #51762
    area-commandlinetools, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • 47569 - Using FrozenDictionary in HttpMethodDictionaryPolicyJumpTable #51803
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Improve path search in Kestrel parsing #51535
    Perf, feature-kestrel, area-networking
  • Dispose secret instances #51253
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • doc(DenyAnonymousAuthorizationRequirement): Actual behaviour is different than class name #51490
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-security
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51616
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `7e33b6a` to `b10fad3` #51801
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `68cd408` to `2c27dd2` #51802
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Skip failing template tests on Win11-arm64 #51311
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `1d1834b` to `99a804e` #51799
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [Component governance] Bump the Azure.Identity dependency #51612
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e47544a` to `b10fad3` #51800
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Avoid requiring ProblemDetailsService when IExeptionHandler is used #51898
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Simplify redis cache setup #49722
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Fix ambiguous route analyzer false positive with switch #51881
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Xamarin Forms Namespace Caused Failure to Generate Code Behind and Compile ALL XAML Files #18637
  • [XVS][VSM][MAUI]There were 3 errors when building and canceling solution several times #18636
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [iOS] MAUI project won't build with the 8.0.0-rc.2.9530 version on Azure Pipeline #18632
  • Error - "Android" system image is incomplete #18629
  • [Android] Rectangle rendering is broken #18628
    Backlog
  • MAUI Map set internal padding to move native controls and images #18627
    Backlog
  • CollectionView's EmptyView Does Not Fill Vertical Space #18626
  • .net Maui Switch thumbcolor can not be set in code after upgrading to .net 8 #18625
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test E1 #18623
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Cannot change Japanese input method after open basic authentication dialog #18619
  • Connecting or Disconnecting Physical Barcode Reader is triggering App Return to Initial Index Page #18618
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test G1 #18613
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Enhancement] Wifi Adapter Controls #18612
    Backlog
  • [Windows]Title bar cannot be hidden when full screen #18611
  • StringContent has no constructors defined #18610

Closed

  • Localization of MenuBarItem on Android not working #18556
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element: Warning: Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout is already a child of Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ContentPage. Remove Microsoft.Maui.Controls.VerticalStackLayout from Microsoft.Maui.Controls.ContentPage before adding to MauiAppPopupError.LoadingView. #18614
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test G5 #18617
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #17977
  • Fix iOS Visual Runner so that all tests pass consistently #18378
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Memory leak with CarouselView #17726
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Compile error multilanguage app upgrade existing project to .net 8 (visual studio preview version 6) #18576
  • Incorrect/Cut off shadows #15924
  • [BUG] 'Microsoft.NET.Sdk.iOS.Manifest-7.0.100 16.4.7125' has incompatible package type. #18604
  • Issue with .NET MAUI in VS 2022 #16027
  • iOS: svg images only bit color, any toolbar image doesn't resize #15728
  • Tab key doesn't move between Entry fields on Mac Catalyst #16255
  • Can't build Maui from main branch #15470
  • .NET MAUI not supported on Ubuntu #15929
  • Expandable items in a StackLayout don't work properly on iOS #16150
  • Programmatically way to Bootstrap Windows Platform in pure C# #8413
  • Error on archiving .net7.0 for android with target platform ARM32: "Invalid option 'ARM32' for /platform; must be anycpu, x86, Itanium, arm, arm64" #15691

PullRequests

Created

  • Core remapping alternate take #18635
  • Replace Deprecated BeginImageContextWithOptions with UIGraphicsImageRenderer #18631
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • builder.Services.AddDbContext not working when iOS app runs on Mac M1 #32257
  • No idea how to make a simple migration using the source code #32256
  • SQLite ignored conversion when using ExecuteUpdateAsync #32252

Closed

  • Improve exception message for "At least one object must implement IComparable” in SaveChanges #26539
  • Usage and maturity of ChangingAndChangedNotifications #32230
  • Use getter to get count of collection without write in Select() #32224
  • EFCore 8 daily label - Converter getting called for writing value to JSON data #32169
  • Update attach entity with Json column in EF #32151
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The instance of entity type 'AccountsLabels' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{AccountsTreeEntityId: 65, LabelId: 25}' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #32149
  • EF Core 7 DbContext.Database.BeginTransaction().GetDbTransaction() -> Not able to create new Transaction in same connection #32120
  • The convention invocations have reached the recursion limit. #32093
  • Using 8.0 Database.SqlQuery() to call FreeTextTable() #32066
  • ValueConverter for entity. #32222
  • Scaffolding fails for some SQLite generated columns #32179
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve some exception messages. #32260
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32259
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32258
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Various stuff from EFCore.PG JSON work #32255
  • Fix to #32235 - Buffering error in JSON deserialization with junk data #32253

Merged

  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #32248
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #32249
  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #32250
  • Scaffolding: Handle unknown computed column SQL in model factory #32251

Updated

  • Temporal table migrations refactor. #32239
  • Make ModelBuilderTest asserts more robust and extensible #32221
    providers-beware

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #17739
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #17735

Merged

  • Remove redundant xml doc test #17734

  • Remove the 8.0.1xx table since the builds are now internal #17681

    Branch Lockdown

    Branch Lockdown

Updated

  • Disable crossgen and zip file creation in the local dev build unless -pack is used #17478
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #17709
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17642
